argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frgrancvvdeq.nx | |- D = ( <. V , E >. Neighbors X ) |
| 2 |  | frgrancvvdeq.ny | |- N = ( <. V , E >. Neighbors Y ) |
| 3 |  | frgrancvvdeq.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 4 |  | frgrancvvdeq.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 5 |  | frgrancvvdeq.ne | |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) |
| 6 |  | frgrancvvdeq.xy | |- ( ph -> Y e/ D ) |
| 7 |  | frgrancvvdeq.f | |- ( ph -> V FriendGrph E ) |
| 8 |  | frgrancvvdeq.a | |- A = ( x e. D |-> ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> x e. D ) |
| 10 |  | #P_riotaex | |- ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) e. _V |
| 11 | 8 | #P_fvmpt2 | |- ( ( x e. D /\ ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) e. _V ) -> ( A ` x ) = ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> ( A ` x ) = ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_sneqd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> { ( A ` x ) } = { ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) } ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_frgrancvvdeqlem4 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> { ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) } = ( ( <. V , E >. Neighbors x ) i^i N ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> { ( A ` x ) } = ( ( <. V , E >. Neighbors x ) i^i N ) ) |
